p: As can be seen in Appendix A, the pre-set questionnaires, based on the literature review output from Section 3.3.1 (regarding the twelve characteristics) and Section 3.3.2 (the nine barriers), were provided to the target groups. They were first chosen based on their active involvement in flood resilience building activities and then snowballing. For the online distribution, surveys were sent through existing networks, such as related professional email group lists and social media platforms. The respondents were asked to choose three characteristics that they believed were most needed and three barriers that were most influential to the situation in Jakarta.
